mapper.select: SELECT m.restaurant_menu_item_id, m.name AS restaurant_menu_item_name, m.price AS restaurant_menu_item_price, m.description AS restaurant_menu_item_description, m.image AS restaurant_menu_item_image, m.status AS restaurant_menu_item_status, r.restaurant_id, r.restaurant_name AS restaurant_name, r.address AS restaurant_address, r.status AS restaurant_status FROM restaurant_menu_item m JOIN restaurant r ON m.restaurant_id = r.restaurant_id WHERE m.restaurant_menu_item_id = #{id}
